description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Neonex Game’s Ultraviolet is a neo-retro arcade game where players must battle to control the board by collecting gems to manipulate the balance of the game. With simple controls and many tactics, do you have what it takes to win?  University of the West of England Best Games Techology Group project 2010.
